snippet.title: Striving for Light: Survival - 1.0 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
~ Coming on 2nd December 2023 ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1646790/Striving_for_Light/
~ Get involved and join our Discord ~ ► https://discord.com/invite/GNEBkQDyUb

~ More information ~ ► https://www.strivingforlight.com/

~ About the game ~Striving for Light: Survival brings the exploration of procedurally generated skill trees to the arena survival roguelite genre. Craft unique builds, unlock new weapons, skills and maps, slay hordes of monsters and take on massive boss fights.
